name: Jean-Pierre Corriveau
content: Jean-Pierre CORRIVEAU homepage Jean-Pierre Corriveau Ph.D. Fall 2025 Associate Professor Director and Graduate Director School of Computer Science E-mail: jeanpier at scs.carleton.ca Please email me for both in-office and on-line meetings Reseeach Topics of Interest Acceptance Testing of Systems with Complex Concurrent and Distributed Scenarios Generation of Executable Test Cases from Scenario Patterns Generic and Contextual Testing of Go4 Design Patterns Graduate Orientation Undergraduate Orientation
